channel.title: CyberNetSec - Data Breach
channel.description: Latest data breach threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: Merck Employee Data Breached in Third-Party Vendor Incident
item.description:
Pharmaceutical giant Merck has confirmed a data breach impacting its current and former employees due to a cybersecurity incident at a third-party service provider, Graebel Companies. The breach, which occurred in September 2025, was disclosed on November 17. Exposed data includes sensitive PII such...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Supply Chain Attack

Read Full Article →

item.title: DoorDash Hit by Data Breach After Employee Targeted in Social Engineering Scam
item.description:
Food delivery service DoorDash has confirmed a data breach after an employee was compromised by a social engineering scam, allowing an unauthorized third party to access internal systems. The breach exposed the names, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses of an undisclosed number of...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Phishing, Cyberattack

item.title: Eurofiber Breach Exposes Thales, Orange, and French Government Data in Major Supply Chain Incident
item.description:
European digital infrastructure provider Eurofiber has confirmed a major data breach in its French division, potentially exposing sensitive data from over 3,600 clients, including major corporations like Thales and Orange, and several French government ministries. A threat actor known as 'ByteToBrea...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Data Breach, Vulnerability, Supply Chain Attack

item.title: Washington Post Breached by Clop Ransomware via Oracle Flaws
item.description:
The Washington Post has officially confirmed it was a victim of a large-scale cyberattack orchestrated by the Clop ransomware group. The threat actors exploited vulnerabilities in Oracle's E-Business Suite, compromising over 100 organizations globally. The campaign involves data exfiltration followe...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: RansomHouse Hits H&M and Adidas Supplier in Major Fashion Supply Chain Attack
item.description:
The RansomHouse ransomware group has attacked Fulgar S.p.A., a major Italian textile manufacturer and a key supplier for global fashion brands like H&M and Adidas. The attack, confirmed on November 3, 2025, resulted in the exfiltration and leak of sensitive corporate data. This incident highlights t...

Severity: High

Categories: Supply Chain Attack, Ransomware, Data Breach

item.title: Checkout.com Rejects Ransom After ShinyHunters Breach, Donates to Research
item.description:
The global payment processor Checkout.com has disclosed a data breach orchestrated by the ShinyHunters cybercrime group. The attackers exploited a legacy third-party cloud file storage system that was improperly decommissioned. After being contacted with a ransom demand, Checkout.com refused to pay....

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Threat Actor, Cloud Security

Read Full Article →

item.title: Search Guard FLX Vulnerability (CVE-2025-12149) Allows DLS Bypass
item.description:
A medium-severity information disclosure vulnerability, CVE-2025-12149, has been disclosed in floragunn's Search Guard FLX, a security plugin for Elasticsearch. The flaw, affecting versions up to 3.1.2, allows an attacker to bypass Document-Level Security (DLS) rules. This occurs specifically when a...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Vulnerability, Data Breach, Security Operations

Read Full Article →

item.title: Synnovis Confirms Patient Data Stolen in Qilin Ransomware Attack on London Hospitals
item.description:
Pathology service provider Synnovis has officially confirmed that patient personal data, including names, NHS numbers, and dates of birth, was stolen during the June 2024 ransomware attack attributed to the Qilin gang. The attack caused widespread disruption to London hospitals, leading to the cance...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

item.title: Clop Ransomware Gang Claims Attack on Dartmouth College, Threatens to Leak Data
item.description:
The notorious Clop ransomware gang has claimed responsibility for a cyberattack against Dartmouth College, an Ivy League university in the U.S. On November 11, 2025, the group added the institution to its dark web leak site, threatening to publish exfiltrated data if the university does not enter ne...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Threat Actor

item.title: Nikkei Slack Breach Exposes Data of 17,000 Users via Stolen Credentials
item.description:
Japanese media giant Nikkei Inc., owner of the Financial Times, has disclosed a significant data breach affecting its internal Slack workspace. An attacker gained access using authentication credentials stolen from an employee's personal computer, which was infected with infostealer malware. The inc...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Cyberattack, Malware
